\pgfsetcolor{black}
  % Edge: word -> sequence
  \draw [->] (54.363bp,77bp) .. controls (85.385bp,77bp) and (137.18bp,77bp)  .. (182.95bp,77bp);
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw (94bp,86.5bp) node {lexicale};
  % Edge: wordX -> sequenceX
  \draw [->] (54.363bp,20bp) .. controls (72.785bp,20bp) and (98.534bp,20bp)  .. (133.95bp,20bp);
  % Edge: sequence -> result
  \draw [->] (243.23bp,77bp) .. controls (279.74bp,77bp) and (342.2bp,77bp)  .. (391.74bp,77bp);
  \draw (340bp,87.5bp) node {syntaxique};
  % Edge: sequenceX -> resultX
  \draw [->] (292.29bp,20bp) .. controls (321.55bp,20bp) and (353.58bp,20bp)  .. (388.28bp,20bp);
  % Node: word
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw [state] (27bp,77bp) ellipse (27bp and 18bp);
  \draw (27bp,77bp) node {mot};
\end{scope}
  % Node: resultX
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw (419bp,20bp) node {\begin{tikzpicture}[node distance=2cm] \node [state, scale=.3] (foo1) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below left of=foo1] (foo2) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below right of=foo1] (foo3) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below left of=foo3] (foo4) {}; \node [state, scale=.3, below right of=foo3] (foo5) {}; \draw [thick] (foo1) -- (foo2) (foo1) -- (foo3) (foo3) -- (foo4) (foo3) -- (foo5); \end{tikzpicture}};
\end{scope}
  % Node: sequence
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw [state] (213bp,77bp) ellipse (30bp and 18bp);
  \draw (213bp,77bp) node {s√©quence};
\end{scope}
  % Node: result
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw [state,accepting] (419bp,77bp) ellipse (27bp and 18bp);
  \draw (419bp,77bp) node {AST};
\end{scope}
  % Node: sequenceX
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw (213bp,20bp) node {[[\code{a} $\mapsto \dots$], [\code{bc} $\mapsto \dots$], $\dots$]};
\end{scope}
  % Node: wordX
\begin{scope}
  \definecolor{strokecol}{rgb}{0.0,0.0,0.0};
  \pgfsetstrokecolor{strokecol}
  \draw (27bp,20bp) node {\code{abcdef}};
\end{scope}
